document_data.caption: Gorar al-Aksar hard at work in his barber shop.
document_data.name: Gorar al-Aksar
document_data.mainbody: '''Gorar al-Aksar''' was a famous [[barber]] and owner of the [[Barber Shop of Gorar al-Aksar]] in the [[Grand Bazaar]] of [[Huzuz]].
document_data.Personality: To say Gorar was popular was an understatement. Even his rival barbers loved him.
document_data.Activities: This singing barber enjoyed providing customers with horoscope readings, even if they did not want them. His storytelling abilities were renowned, often drawing listeners to his shop.
document_data.Possessions: Gorar owned a smoking ''[[efreeti bottle]]'' that he kept on display in his shop.
document_data.History: Gorar was a fixture of the Grand Bazaar for over 40 years.
